Description: Monsoon rains led to flooding in low-lying areas of Lucknow.
Intense rainfall resulted in waterlogging and disrupted transportation.
Protests and strikes disrupted normal life and transportation in the city.
Lucknow faced a major outbreak of the COVID-19 pandemic
A major fire broke out in a residential area
An extreme heatwave with temperatures exceeding 45Â°C affected the city.
Heavy monsoon rains caused significant flooding in parts of Lucknow.
A severe dust storm and thunderstorm caused damage to property and power outages.
A moderate earthquake with a magnitude of 4.8 rattled the city.
A sudden hailstorm caused damage to crops and vehicles in Lucknow.
